content:
If you are on INVASION – STAGE II, SPIRE UNDER ATTACK!, or FALL OF SPIRE, record 216.2 tomorrow on the day track and do not read the rest of this entry. Otherwise, continue reading:

READ ONE:

If SPIRE FALLEN: You wake in a fret, your dreams haunted by terrifying visions. Your encounters with the reclaimers must have you on edge. But today is a new day—and an exciting one, at that. For despite the devastation caused by the reclaimer invasion, today is the day the Blossom Festival is set to begin in Brookside. You thought that perhaps the festival would be delayed on account of what happened in Spire, but the people are resilient and have already begun to rebuild. Perhaps a festival is just what they need to keep their spirits high.

Otherwise: You wake to the sound of birdsong and emerge from your tent, feeling refreshed. You smile as you remember that the Blossom Festival begins today in Brookside.

» Continue reading:

Complete each Festival mission.

Gain THE FESTIVITIES BEGIN mission.

Record 216.3 four days from now on the day track. Record Wild Growth underneath the weather for today and the next three days. On those days, use Wild Growth instead of the indicated weather. Return the current weather to the collection and replace it with Wild Growth.

Travel to Brookside soon to attend the Blossom Festival.
